Listeriosis (Tests for Listeria monocytogenes Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    5021-1 Listeria monocytogenes rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    61369-5 Listeria monocytogenes DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    82184-3 Listeria monocytogenes DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection
    89596-1 Listeria monocytogenes DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
